metadata.name: The Lounge
metadata.description:
The lounge is Part of exclusive NFT collection minted exclusively for "ABANDONED", a Photobook depicting the story of The Boys Village located in St Athan in South Wales, UK. 

The village was built as a holiday camp for children of the coalfields in the 1920s, eventually abandoned in 1980s it has now fallen to disrepair, however, still standing, vandalised, it is filled with eye catching graffiti. Making it an area of interest which would soon be lost forever. 

Photo Location in book : Chapter | The Host
Book ISBN : 9781739314101 (without dash)
                         978-1-7393141-0-1 (with dash)
